definitions.definition: a small group of people having a particular task.
a small number of soldiers assembled for drill or assigned to some special task, especially an infantry unit forming part of a platoon.
examples: detachment, detail, unit, platoon, battery, troop, patrol, squadron, cadre, commando, tiger team an elite reconnaissance squad

definitions.definition: a group of sports players or competitors from which a team is chosen.
examples: eleven first-string players on the Nebraska squad

definitions.definition: a division of a police force dealing with a particular crime or type of crime.
